name: World of Pong
description:
You think you have played pong. Nah, you haven't.

Just as in the pong that we all know, the ball bounces around between the two edges of the screen. But apart from that goes trough portals, hits rocks, passes trough puddles. World of Pong is a rework of the old classic, bringing multiple modes - water flood, sand castle, double trouble, fire canon and many more!

Bet you will never look at pong the same way...

HOW TO DOWNLOAD:

1. Press the download button

2. Right click on the .zip folder

3. Extract all...

4. Open the .exe with the games name
